text: Michael Pettersson (born 22 June 1956) is a Swedish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Sweden Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Kristianstad Municipality
title: Michael Pettersson (equestrian)
